job.name: Script_VBS
job.description: A workflow that executes a Visual Basic Script in the JVM.

task.name: VBS_Task
task.description: The simplest task, ran by a VBS engine.

script.code: Set wshShell = CreateObject( "WScript.Shell" ) Set wshProcessEnv = wshShell.Environment( "PROCESS" ) Wscript.Echo "Hello World from Job " & wshProcessEnv( "variables_PA_JOB_ID" )
